title: Paraprofessional for the Blind and Visually Impaired
status: Part Time, 27.5 hours per weekMinimum Requirements:Associate's degreeor48 semester hours from an accredited college/universityorpassing results on an approved Paraprofessional Assessment.Must have passed the Unified English Braille (UEB) Exam or must pass exam within one contract year.The salary for this position is assigned to Level 5 of the SC Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkSC Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Special Education Paraprofessional - Blind & Vision Impaired.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
